"Secret Training":
"Ah, there you are! Your timing couldn't be
better. You have to join me! You see, I just
accepted this mission for the White
Summit, but you know how it's a bad idea
to go alone? At least, that's what they've
drilled into our heads all this time. Well,
that's why-- Huh? Why don't I just go with
Zeno? I can go with whoever I please!
*Go with Echo only and complete the
request with S Rank on Hard difficulty."

"ああ、きみきみ。
少しあたしに付き合いなさい！
……いや、ちょっと凍土エリアの
任務を受けようと思うんだけど……
ほら、一人での任務はあまり良くないって
口酸っぱく教わったじゃない？　だから！
ゼノと行けって？　い、いいじゃない別に！
あたしが誰と行こうがあたしの勝手でしょ！

※エコーのみ同行、ハード以上Ｓランククリア"
